title: Admission; discharge; civil liability
context: ยง334-24 Admission; discharge; civil liability. No person shall be admitted to, detained at, or discharged from any psychiatric facility except as provided in this chapter and in chapters 571, 704 and 706. [L 1967, c 259, pt of ยง1; HRS ยง334-24; am L 1976, c 130, ยง2]
